Package edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.connectfour.GUI

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMenu
    Abstract class for the menus used in the Implements several useful methods that are used by multiple menus
    BoardDisplay
    GUI class that handles drawing the board Updates via repaint() which calls paint() also draws the small green circles over winning circles when a win is detected in Board class
    Circle
    Circle draws a circle at the specified location and with the specified color.
    InGameMenu
    Class for the menu panel shown while the game is played.
    MainMenu
    Panel for the main menu screen
    Player1ColorSelectMenu
    Class for the color selection menu for player 1
    Player2ColorSelectMenu
    Class for the player color selection menu for player 2
    RulesPage
    Class for the rules page
    SettingsMenu
    Class for settings menu Currently only has a checkbox for entering Testing mode for easy printing out of game grid
    SinglePlayerMenu
    Class for the Single player menu where the difficulty is chosen
    StartScreen
    Class for the first screen that appears with the logo and "click here to start" button
